backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor defining feature requests, user profiles, announcements, assignments, and study tasks with access control and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a frontend change request and associated metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files for reference or tooling use.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes with global styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app at #root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application wiring routes with TanStack Router and wrapping in ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/AssignmentChatbo: Large chatbot component supporting multilingual assignment help, voice input/output, OCR, and downloadable responses.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: App layout with header navigation, mobile drawer, routed outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/components/StudentSathiAssi: Interactive assistant component handling messages, voice input, OCR via Tesseract, and assignment generation/confirmation flows.
frontend/src/components/studyPlanner/Sub: Renders a subject label with color styling based on subjectColorMapping.
frontend/src/components/UserGuidelineDoc: Empty component file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, recreating it on identity changes and invalidating related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, login/logout handling, and persistent identity loading using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for feature requests, assignment generation logic, conversation saving, and study planner mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useStudyPlannerSort.t: Stores and retrieves the study planner sort mode from localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useStudyPlannerView.t: Persists and restores the study planner view mode (daily/weekly) using localStorage.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base theme with color variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
Large UI page for creating formatted assignments with multilingual interface, settings, headings, and AI assistant integration.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page showing a hero section and a grid of navigation cards linking to various tools.
Provides a form for generating a formatted student leave application and supports copying the output.
frontend/src/pages/NotesCleanerPage.tsx: Cleans and formats rough notes into structured text with a simple processing UI and copy option.
frontend/src/pages/RequestFeaturePage.ts: Form allowing users to submit feature requests with optional email, using a mutation hook.
frontend/src/pages/ResumeBuilderPage.tsx: Builds a simple text-based resume from user inputs including projects, with add/delete and copy features.
frontend/src/pages/StudyPlannerPage.tsx: Full-featured study planner supporting tasks, sorting, guest vs authenticated mode, and export utilities.
Parses duration strings into minutes and formats minute counts back into readable hour/minute strings.
frontend/src/utils/studyPlannerGuestStor: Manages guest-mode study tasks in localStorage, including loading, saving, adding, toggling completion, deleting, and clearing tasks.
frontend/src/utils/studyPlannerPdfExport: Generates printable HTML for study tasks and opens it in a new window for PDF export via the browser print dialog.
frontend/src/utils/studyPlannerSort.ts: Provides deterministic sorting for tasks by date/time or by creation order using timestamps and IDs.
frontend/src/utils/studyPlannerTaskDateT: Converts date/time inputs to backend-friendly formats and formats stored date/time values for display.
frontend/src/utils/studyPlannerTxtExport: Builds a plain-text export of study tasks with headers, summaries, and formatted task details, then downloads it as a TXT file.
frontend/src/utils/subjectColorMapping.t: Maps subjects to predefined color names and returns associated badge and indicator CSS classes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles getting, storing, and clearing URL/session parameters, supporting both query and hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, animations, and typography/container-query plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project requirements and state for adding a Daily progress bar feature to the Study Planner, including constraints and pending requests.
unknown.txt: Describes a fixed assignment editor format with download options, autosave, citation tools, and an embedded Student Sathi Assistant with specific UI and behavior rules.
